reviewtext: I understand this keyboard is no no longer easily available.  I bought one at a local second-hand store for $3.83 and am happy with it.  The keys are rather loud and clickty-clack but its study.  The blue bottons on the top arent that useful.  But its a very comfortable keyboard to use.  I like the wrist rest especially and the space-bar works well.  I like the USB ports on the KB, I plug my USB mouse into one and the other is free for now.  Highly recommended if you can find one.
